name: Andra Bailey Visual Artist May 8, 2021
description: Andra Bailey is a Brooklyn based artist known for her whimsical and colorful paintings. Her work has appeared on the cover of the New York Times Magazine, as a public installation in Chicago, and has been shown in galleries and museums around the world. Her solo show, “A Chain of Flowers”, currently runs at The Museum of Arts and Design in NYC. https://www.instagram.com/evartology/
